<a id="class_GraphElement"></a>

# GraphElement

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [Container](class_container.md) **<** [Control](class_control.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [GraphFrame](class_graphframe.md), [GraphNode](class_graphnode.md)

A container that represents a basic element that can be placed inside a [GraphEdit](class_graphedit.md) control.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**GraphElement** allows to create custom elements for a [GraphEdit](class_graphedit.md) graph. By default such elements can be selected, resized, and repositioned, but they cannot be connected. For a graph element that allows for connections see [GraphNode](class_graphnode.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Signals

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_delete_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**delete_request**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_delete_request)

Emitted when removing the GraphElement is requested.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_dragged"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**dragged**\ (\ from\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md), to\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_dragged)

Emitted when the GraphElement is dragged.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_node_deselected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**node_deselected**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_node_deselected)

Emitted when the GraphElement is deselected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_node_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**node_selected**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_node_selected)

Emitted when the GraphElement is selected.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_position_offset_changed"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**position_offset_changed**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_position_offset_changed)

Emitted when the GraphElement is moved.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_raise_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**raise_request**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_raise_request)

Emitted when displaying the GraphElement over other ones is requested. Happens on focusing (clicking into) the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_resize_end"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resize_end**\ (\ new_size\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_resize_end)

Emitted when releasing the mouse button after dragging the resizer handle (see [resizable](class_graphelement.md#class_GraphElement_property_resizable)).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_signal_resize_request"></a>

<!-- classref-signal -->

**resize_request**\ (\ new_size\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_signal_resize_request)

Emitted when resizing the GraphElement is requested. Happens on dragging the resizer handle (see [resizable](class_graphelement.md#class_GraphElement_property_resizable)).

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_GraphElement_property_draggable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **draggable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_property_draggable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draggable**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_draggable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can drag the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_property_position_offset"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](class_vector2.md) **position_offset** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_property_position_offset)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_position_offset**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](class_vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](class_vector2.md) **get_position_offset**\ (\ )

The offset of the GraphElement, relative to the scroll offset of the [GraphEdit](class_graphedit.md).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_property_resizable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **resizable** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_property_resizable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_resizable**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_resizable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can resize the GraphElement.

\ **Note:** Dragging the handle will only emit the [resize_request](class_graphelement.md#class_GraphElement_signal_resize_request) and [resize_end](class_graphelement.md#class_GraphElement_signal_resize_end) signals, the GraphElement needs to be resized manually.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_property_selectable"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **selectable** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_property_selectable)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_selectable**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_selectable**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the user can select the GraphElement.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_GraphElement_property_selected"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **selected** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_property_selected)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_selected**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_selected**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the GraphElement is selected.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="class_GraphElement_theme_icon_resizer"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **resizer** [ðŸ”—](#class_GraphElement_theme_icon_resizer)

The icon used for the resizer, visible when [resizable](class_graphelement.md#class_GraphElement_property_resizable) is enabled.
